summary: Honeybees are special insects that live in big groups called colonies. They make honey and wax, which people use for food and to make things like candles and cosmetics. There are only a few types of true honeybees, but many other bees also make honey. Humans have spread honeybees around the world for their honey and to help with farming. These bees are important because they help plants grow by moving pollen from one flower to another.
title: Honey bee
